update user_withdraw_cash

update user_withdraw_cash set userid = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_card_id = #{bankCardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_pass = #{isPass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appay_money = #{appayMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=CHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT t1.*, t.username as username, t.truename as truename, t.phoneno as phoneno, t.user_sort as userSort FROM users t, user_withdraw_cash t1 WHERE t1.userid = t.id AND t.del_flag = '0' AND t1.del_flag = '0'
and t.truename LIKE CONCAT('%','${truename}','%' )
and t.phoneno LIKE CONCAT('%','${phoneno}','%' )
and t.user_sort = #{userSort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC

SELECT t1.*, t.username as username, t.truename as truename, t.phoneno as phoneno, t.user_sort as userSort FROM users t, user_withdraw_cash t1 WHERE t1.userid = t.id AND t.del_flag = '0' AND t1.del_flag = '0'
and t.user_sort=#{userSort}
and t.truename like CONCAT("%",#{truename},"%")
and t.phoneno LIKE CONCAT('%','${phoneno}','%' )
ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC
